thread.title: Palo Alto School District to Vote on Renaming Two Schools, Joining National Debate
thread.title_full: Palo Alto School District to Vote on Renaming Two Schools, Joining National Debate

author: Michael Krasny
title: Palo Alto School District to Vote on Renaming Two Schools, Joining National Debate

organizations.name: palo alto unified school district board of education

text: Palo Alto may join a growing number of towns and campuses that are renaming buildings over the troubling legacies left by their namesakes. The Palo Alto Unified School District Board of Education is set to vote Tuesday evening whether to rename Jordan Middle School and Terman Middle School because they were named after prominent advocates of eugenics. As the names of important buildings are debated in Palo Alto and across the nation, should their namesakes be weighed against modern values or does doing so risk erasing community history?
